footer.useOfThisSite: Use of this site is subject to the following

home.whoWeAre: Inc•Digital supports you in your new phase.
home.incDigitalStory: Inc•Digital is an experience design and product development agency. We bring your ideas into reality with beautiful execution to drive your business solutions.

threeSteps.researchDescription: Research is key to us, we pay close attention to all the elements of the puzzle before initiating the dance.
threeSteps.planningDescription: It is even more important to make sure we value your time. Expect accurate planning from us.
threeSteps.deliveryDescription: And results will be there, your expectations delivered thanks to our method.

workflow.title: TAILOR-MADE SOLUTIONS
workflow.ourStrategy: Make your expectations converge with our know-how thanks to benevolent exchanges with our digital experts around our Meta workshops.
workflow.ourStrategy2: Transform your expectations or ideas into a mature project ready for any eventuality.

communicate.title: Communicate
communicate.description: We begin every client project with strategic curiosity. We ask questions designed to understand what our clients want and need.

evaluate.title: Evaluate
evaluate.description: The primary purpose of evaluation, in addition to gaining insight into prior or existing initiatives, is to enable reflection and assist in the identification of future change.

design.title: Design
design.description: We actualize your vision from concept to integration to bring beautiful, user-optimized design to your project.

develop.title: Develop
develop.description: Development phase is about transforming the design of a system into a computer language format. We translate design specifications into the source code.

test.title: Test
test.description: Testing allows developers to deliver software that meets expectations, prevents unexpected results, and improves the long term maintenance of the application.

release.title: Release
release.description: A release is the distribution of the final version of an application. We ensure that the project is delivered in time and that we are in phase with our customers.

support.title: Support
support.description: We make sure to meet the needs of maintenance to support the new features that the users want or to change different types of functionalities of the system according to the customer demands.

expertise.title: A powerful and robust skillset
expertise.description: Inc•Digital ensures that you understand your expectations in accordance with the Agile methodology, we put your needs at the forefront.
expertise.description2: In a context of rapid change, meeting deadlines and production costs are our priorities.
expertise.description3: Our solutions are user-centric, which characterizes our core value: inclusiveness.
expertise.description4: In order to obtain an ideal market fit product, we are also sensitive to the aesthetics of our works.

software.title: Software
software.ourPhilosophy: While making software, we take into account the final user point of view. We ensure to perform above and beyond expectations. We care about User Experience, User Interface but also Portability, Reliability, Flexibility, Maintainability & Cost Effectiveness. They do what they are designed to, not more or less.

marketingAndDesign.title: Marketing & Design
marketingAndDesign.ourPhilosophy: Our marketing philosophy is really all about honest empathy with your customers. Our goal is to be able to make business communicating with people as efficiently as possible. As for our design thinking, We create Art from client expectations. Our goal is to integrate with your team to help you identify and achieve your objectives and grow your business.

creations.title: Our creations
creations.client1: Burkina Faso company Filinfos desired a News Mobile App for their new website
creations.client2: A mother wished her daughters could sort and try out their clothes in a Mobile App
creations.client3: Start of fire reporting tool for firemen in France
creations.client4: Artbox, a local business, wanted to enter the digital world with a Click & Collect Ecommerce platform

technology.title: Technology is who we are
technology.description: We utilize many platforms and frameworks to accomplish your vision.

contactForm.title: contact
contactForm.subtitle: Get in touch
contactForm.descriptionStepContact: Thanks for your interest in working with us. Please complete the details below and we'll get back to you in one business day.
contactForm.fieldCompanyName: What the name of company / organization?
contactForm.titleStepTechnology: What can we help you with ?
contactForm.descriptionStepBudget: A transparent budget will help us ensure expectations are met. Not sure? Ballparks are fine.
contactForm.fieldHearAboutUs: How did you heard about us ?
